description: Returns the textual content of a specific email message stored in the archive. Attachments are not included.

parameters.name: ArchivedMessageId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the archived email message.

nested_items.name: Html
nested_items.description: The HTML body content of the message.

nested_items.name: MessageMalformed
nested_items.description: A flag indicating if the email was malformed.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The plain text body content of the message.
